name: Cube Adventure (IlyasX)
description:
Description

This is my first game. It's a 3d Platformer. I made it with Unity. You can select, which way you want to go. I created 2 ways, but I will add more.  There could be bugs, because it's my first game like I said. 

Controls

W/Up - Forward

S/Down - Backward

A/Left/Mouse - Turn Left

D/Right/Mouse - Turn Right

Space - Jump
